User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Allow important content
Allow: /diary/
Allow: /music/
Allow: /writing/
Allow: /chapters/
Allow: /community/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /contact/

# Block admin/technical folders if they exist
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /_drafts/
Disallow: /vendor/
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Tell search engines where your sitemap is
Sitemap: https://mileenarayne.com/sitemap.xml
